submitter_id: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.
if_tumour: This field is only required if the specimen is a tumour.
disease_status_requirement: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.
multiple_values: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.
